dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Guard
dialogueItems.dialogue: Oh, hello there. What are you doing wandering outside the gates alone? It's not safe.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Player
dialogueItems.dialogue: Not safe?

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Guard
dialogueItems.dialogue: Indeed, many vile beasts lurk around in the outskirts. It is not wise to travel alone and unprotected.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Player
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah I see. And why are you out here alone?

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Guard
dialogueItems.dialogue: I am a member of the king's royal guard! It is my duty to watch the gate and make sure that the people of Ewtopia stay protected.

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: The name's Humphrey by the way.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Player
dialogueItems.dialogue: Kane.

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: I've never seen you around here before. Is this your first time visiting Ewtopia?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Yep. What is this place?

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: This is the great city of Ewtopia! A land of joy and riches! Filled with opportunities and possibilities!

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ewtopia is a place for everyone, even you my friend. If you would like to become a citizen, go and speak to the city mayor.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Where can I find him?

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: He should be in the house straight at the end.

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: Here, I'll open the gates for you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Thanks, see you around.

dialogueItems.speaker: Humphrey
dialogueItems.name: Humphrey
dialogueItems.dialogue: As much as I hate standing in this heat all day, nothing beats the views from here.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Unlikable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Good day sir.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: You don't look like everybody else.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Unlikable
dialogueItems.dialogue: You're right sir. But not too long ago, I was just as beautiful as them.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: I worked at the bank, sorting the coins. I was actually really good at it! Fast-hands Gilbert they used to call me.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: So what happened?

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: I lost it all sir. The bank could not afford to hire me so they threw me out.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Everybody else abandoned me, I was alone.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: But that's enough about me. I've never seen you here before. Are you new?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: It's my first time here. It seems like a nice place.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Don't be fooled, the people here may seem friendly, but they only care about themselves. That is the reason this city is falling apart.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'll keep that in mind.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: But you seem like a kind fellow. Do you think you could help me out?

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: What do you need?

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Sir, I have nothing at the moment, not even a roof over my head. Could you spare any change?

itemRequired.dialogue: Thank you so much kind sir! I will be forever grateful!

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Have a delightful day sir.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Hello my friend! I hope that you are having a wonderful day.

dialogueItems.speaker: Gilbert
dialogueItems.name: Gilbert
dialogueItems.dialogue: Thank you so much kind sir! I will be forever grateful!

dialogueItems.speaker: Civilian1
dialogueItems.name: Ewtopian Civilian
dialogueItems.dialogue: What a lovely day it is today, too bad I'll be spending most of it indoors.

dialogueItems.speaker: Civilian2
dialogueItems.name: Ewtopian Civilaian
dialogueItems.dialogue: Watch out for the Unlikeables, nasty bunch they are.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah, a new face in Ewtopia. You don't see that every day.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Kane. I'm just passing through.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Well, Kane, if you do decide to stay for a while, I may have a job for you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: I'm listening.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: As you have probably already seen, we are a bit short on guards and the beasts outside of these walls keep on getting closer.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Bring me the head of one of those beasts and I will make sure that you are rewarded. What do you say?
dialogueItems.answer0: Sounds easy enough. I'll get you that head.

dialogueItems.speaker: Captain
dialogueItems.name: Guard Captain
dialogueItems.dialogue: Did you manage to get that beast head?

itemRequired.dialogue: Splendid! Here is your reward, as promised.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Good day stranger! It's nice to see a new face in Ewtopia.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Hello mayor. My name is Kane. Your guard at the gate told me that I should talk to you regarding citizenship.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ah yes, if you wish to become a citizen, you must first buy a house. Each house costs a single platinum coin.

itemRequired.dialogue: Wonderful! Here is the key to your new house. I hope that you have a wonderful stay.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: Who are those people outside? The dull looking ones?

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Those are the Unlikeables. Once upstanding members of our society, now shamed and worthless.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: You're the mayor aren't you? Isn't it your job to help them?

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Ha! The Unlikeables do not own any property, therefore they aren't citizens of Ewtopia anymore. I am not their Mayor.

dialogueItems.speaker: Kane
dialogueItems.name: Kane
dialogueItems.dialogue: So you are just going to discard and forget about them??

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: That's the way life works, unfortunately.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: Now, I am quite busy at the moment so I am afraid I will have to leave you.

dialogueItems.speaker: Mayor
dialogueItems.name: Mayor
dialogueItems.dialogue: I would love to sit around and chat, but unfortunately I have quite a lot of work to do.

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable1
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Please help me sir, I'm starving.

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable1
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Thank you so much sir! You have no idea how much this will help me!

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable1
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: Thank you for your kindness sir! How could I ever repay you?

dialogueItems.speaker: Unlikeable2
dialogueItems.name: Unlikeable
dialogueItems.dialogue: How can people treat others like this? I wouldn't wish it on anyone.
